survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personalized Travel Planning Assistants Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have utilized AI-powered travel planning assistants to understand their satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered travel planning assistants?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the scale is clear and covers all possible usage frequencies. Mobile-friendly with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered travel planning assistants?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered travel planning assistant do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections and an open-ended option for additional features not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered travel planning assistant do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of the recommendations provided by the AI-powered travel planning assistant? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clear measurement of satisfaction. Ensure the scale is visually balanced.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of the recommendations provided by the AI-powered travel planning assistant? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered travel planning assistants?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered travel planning assistants?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the AI-powered travel planning assistant to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge overall satisfaction and likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the AI-powered travel planning assistant to others?
